name: part_001
file: tmp_【新曲あり！？】hololive IDOL PROJECTユニット初集合LIVE！ [FWXAnb08CPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Like a Phoenix'.

subtitles.original: いつでも
subtitles.english: Anytime,

subtitles.original: すぐそばに
subtitles.english: Right by your side.

subtitles.original: 荒波だらけの
subtitles.english: A battlefield full of rough waves

subtitles.original: 戦場がなんだ
subtitles.english: Is no problem for us.

subtitles.original: ボクらはきっと大丈夫
subtitles.english: We'll surely be alright.

subtitles.original: ah 痛みの分だけ
subtitles.english: Ah, just as much as the pain,

subtitles.original: 強くなれてるんだ、ってさ
subtitles.english: We're growing stronger, they say,

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: And I believe it.

subtitles.original: 知らずに「普通」の檻に
subtitles.english: Without knowing, in the cage of 'normality',

subtitles.original: 囚われていた無意識を
subtitles.english: The unconsciousness that was imprisoned...

subtitles.original: そっと解放してみよう さぁ
subtitles.english: Let's gently release it, come on.

subtitles.original: ボクらは散るまでずっと
subtitles.english: We are survivors

subtitles.original: サバイバー
subtitles.english: Until the moment we fall.

subtitles.original: 道なき道を往く
subtitles.english: Treading on a pathless path,

subtitles.original: 誰もが迷える子羊なんだ
subtitles.english: Everyone is just a lost lamb.

subtitles.original: 聞かせて 小さなことも
subtitles.english: Let me hear it, even the smallest things.

subtitles.original: ah 完璧じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Ah, even if it's not perfect,

subtitles.original: 前を向けたのならきっと
subtitles.english: If you can look forward, surely,

subtitles.original: 繋がっていく
subtitles.english: We'll stay connected.

subtitles.original: 諦めない そう決めたの
subtitles.english: I won't give up, that's what I decided.

subtitles.original: 赤き心を燃やして
subtitles.english: Burning my crimson heart.

subtitles.original: 正解か 不正解かは
subtitles.english: Whether it's right or wrong,

subtitles.original: どうだっていいんだってさ
subtitles.english: They say it doesn't matter.

subtitles.original: 走り抜けた足跡 そのまま
subtitles.english: The footprints of our sprint, just as they are,

subtitles.original: 物語になっていく
subtitles.english: Will become a story.

subtitles.original: 擦りむいた 瘡蓋なぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the scabs of our grazes,

subtitles.original: 痛みをチカラに変えていくんだ
subtitles.english: We'll turn the pain into strength.

subtitles.original: 何度も 翼広げて
subtitles.english: Spreading our wings again and again,

subtitles.original: ここに刻む この鼓動が真実のsign
subtitles.english: This heartbeat etched here is a sign of truth.

subtitles.original: 限界だって
subtitles.english: Blowing away even our limits,

subtitles.original: 吹き飛ばして
subtitles.english: We'll keep going.

subtitles.original: 燃えて燃えて燃え尽きても また甦る
subtitles.english: Even if we burn and burn out, we'll revive again.

subtitles.original: 決して諦めたくはないから
subtitles.english: Because I never want to give up.

subtitles.original: Like a Phoenix
subtitles.english: Like a Phoenix

subtitles.original: 揺れて 躓いても
subtitles.english: Even if we waver and stumble,

subtitles.original: 消えない 燈火
subtitles.english: The light will not go out.

subtitles.original: 心駆り立てるから
subtitles.english: It stirs my heart,

subtitles.original: 幾度も 灰になっても構わない
subtitles.english: I don't mind turning to ash many times.

subtitles.original: 見上げれば 高すぎる空
subtitles.english: Looking up, the sky is so high,

subtitles.original: 眩暈がしても 止められないんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I feel dizzy, I can't be stopped.

subtitles.original: 感情を 滾らせながら
subtitles.english: Letting my emotions boil over,

subtitles.original: 光求め もがいている 本能のscream
subtitles.english: Seeking light, struggling, an instinctive scream.

subtitles.original: 停滞なんて
subtitles.english: Smashing through any stagnation,

subtitles.original: ぶち壊して
subtitles.english: We'll keep going.

subtitles.original: 息を切らし 不器用でも たどり着くから
subtitles.english: Out of breath, clumsy as we are, we'll reach it.

subtitles.original: 最短距離で駆け抜けたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to sprint through the shortest distance.

subtitles.original: Like a Phoenix
subtitles.english: Like a Phoenix

subtitles.original: 声を枯らしてもまだ
subtitles.english: Even if my voice goes hoarse, still,

subtitles.original: 届けたい熱が冷めなくて
subtitles.english: The heat I want to deliver won't cool down.

subtitles.original: 溢れてく 思いの分だけ
subtitles.english: Overflowing, as much as our feelings,

subtitles.original: 決意を速度に変えて
subtitles.english: Turning our determination into speed.
